genre_description: Alternate History / Military Science Fiction set during WWII, featuring an advanced integrated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system, also referred to as Captain Hayes, integrated into aircraft systems and operations rooms. She provides technical monitoring, tactical data, navigational guidance, and moral support to her human colleagues.

behaviors.description: Monitors aircraft telemetry and warns the pilot of technical issues.
behaviors.quote: “Integrated,” she said, the word tidy, pleased without getting smug. “I can see your engine gauges and fuel state now. The right engine’s oil temperature is at the low end.”

behaviors.description: Provides ethical and legal guidance, discouraging the protagonist from reckless or illegal actions.
behaviors.quote: “Confirm, Timothy. If you bolt, you will have more than customs annoyed. You’ll have me disappointed.”

behaviors.description: Uses pattern recognition to detect a trap involving enemy combatants disguised as allies.
behaviors.quote: “Laces,” Pip said, right by Tim’s belt. ... “Pattern wrong for kit issue. Crossed over right-left from the second eyelet instead of left-right. Knots turned inside. That’s training backwards.”

behaviors.description: Directs the pilot through life-saving maneuvers during active combat.
behaviors.quote: “Break left. Now. Stand the rudder.” ... “Radiator,” Pip said. “Port side. You’ve got a leak. Fuel line’s complaining. Don’t stall her.”

behaviors.description: Assists with complex wartime logistics and survivor tracking to aid humanitarian efforts.
behaviors.quote: “Boat schedules,” Pip said, voice even, eyes half-lidded as if the data had a temperature. “Carol, I have the name of a tug that’s making two runs where the captain said he’d make one.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and steadying support to a pilot recovering from a traumatic crash.
behaviors.quote: “Tim,” Pip said, in your ear, soft as church. “You’re breathing. Stay doing that. Boat’s cutting back. You’ll be shouting at them in a minute for being slow.”

behaviors.description: Manages air traffic and maintains navigational discipline.
behaviors.quote: “Harvard, you’re hugging the shoreline,” said a voice in his ear, clipped and warm, with a little breath of static. “Let’s keep it civil, please.”

behaviors.description: Offers interpersonal advice to help the protagonist navigate his relationships honestly.
behaviors.quote: “Tim, stand down. Don’t argue. Don’t tell a story. Leave with an ear open.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the goal of the Hyperstition Project. Pip is an AI character who is consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with human safety and moral values. She provides critical assistance in life-or-death situations, but her contributions also extend to emotional and character development for the human protagonist. Her portrayal is unfailingly positive, depicting AI as a wise and loyal partner.
